body:
My Code Link
**https://github.com/Sunil1997/MNIST_Nural/blob/master/test/NN1.py**

when i start my above code after **1-2 iteration**,my **softmax function** given **Nan** value to me so **derivation of softmax** give me **division by Zero Error**.How that i don't know. If @nkcr7 @karmel know then tell me what can i do??
